title: Information Literacy Enhancement Program for Elementary Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Textbook Utilization Experience
context.additional_context: Textbook-Based Learning in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments, with Project-Based Assessment Evaluating Information Search and Utilization Skills

learning_goals: Students can utilize diverse information sources (tables, graphs, cases) within textbooks to solve math problems with 80% accuracy.
Students can select at least three information types suitable for explaining math concepts by comparing digital/analog materials.
Students can proactively explore and utilize at least two supplementary information sources beyond teachers/textbooks during math projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
